output: html_notebook

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# load libraries
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r message=FALSE}
# load data frame
products <- read_csv('products.csv')
```

```{r}
# inspect data frame
head(products)
summary(products)
```

```{r}
# Creating a graph with ggplot2
graph <- ggplot(data=products, aes(x=Product_name, y=Price)) + geom_point(aes(color=Product_name), alpha = 0.5) + labs(title = "Product vs Price", subtitle = "From Amazon.ca")
graph
```
